page.title: 06CALVERLEY ACTION GROUP
page.content: Considerable interest is taken in any planning application within the village,particulary any in the older part of the village,which is itself a conservation area.together with the Tong Cockersdale warden and his assistants constant efforts are being made to keep the woods tidy and free from litter,to repair and rebuild dry stone walls and,generally, to preserve the village and the land immediately around it in order to provide a good environment for the people of the village both now and in the future.
